statements: SELECT * FROM company_policies;
SELECT policy_title, created_at FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_title, policy_content FROM company_policies WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM company_policies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT policy_title FROM company_policies WHERE policy_content LIKE '%employee%';
SELECT * FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_title, policy_content FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM company_policies WHERE policy_title LIKE '%security%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_title, created_at FROM company_policies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM company_policies;
SELECT * FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_title, policy_content FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT policy_id, policy_title, policy_content FROM company_policies WHERE policy_title LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM company_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_access WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM company_policies WHERE policy_title='Privacy Policy';
SELECT policy_title, policy_content FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM employee_access ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employee_access GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_employees > 5;
SELECT employee_id, policy_title, access_level FROM employee_access JOIN company_policies ON employee_access.policy_id = company_policies.policy_id ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_title, effective_date FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_roles WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Sales%';
SELECT policy_title, policy_description FROM company_policies WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM employee_roles WHERE role_name IN ('Manager', 'Developer', 'Analyst');
SELECT * FROM company_policies WHERE effective_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_title, policy_description FROM company_policies WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE manager_id = 1001;
SELECT policy_title, effective_date FROM company_policies JOIN departments ON company_policies.policy_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT guideline_title, category FROM guidelines WHERE category = 'Security';
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY access_time;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND name LIKE 'A%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY effective_date ASC;
SELECT guideline_title, guideline_content FROM guidelines WHERE category = 'Security' AND guideline_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, employee_job_title FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM company_policies WHERE policy_effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees WHERE employee_job_title = 'Manager' AND employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT policy_title, policy_description FROM company_policies WHERE policy_category = 'Safety' ORDER BY policy_effective_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT policy_title, policy_category FROM company_policies WHERE policy_effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, employee_job_title FROM employees ORDER BY employee_job_title ASC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM employee_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM employee_policies WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
